column4: I got an e-mail with the subject "Cron <root@prometheus> test -e /usr/sbin/anacron || run-parts --report /etc/cron.daily" and the body "run-parts: /etc/cron.daily/exim4-base exited with return code 1". What does this mean?
not much.
is there anything I need to do. Is there a problem?
keep you eye on things but you houls be ok.
what does "houls" mean?
means im a crappy typer.
what did you mean to type instead of "houls"?
I meant you should be ok
what are the things I should watch out for? How can I make sure I am not relaying spam?
do you have a firewall?
block port 25 on the external interface
how?
iptables
to block port 25 on the external interface to prevent mail relaying should do iptables -A PREROUTING dport port: 25 j DROP
something like that.
please double check the rule thanks.
are you maquerading?
what is maquerading?
how much of iptables do you know?
absolutely nothing?
I would say you must understand the process of NAT via iptables first. I
its not to complicated.
start here http://netfilter.org/ they have good real world tutorials.
I have gone through the tutorial. Should I do iptables -A INPUT p tcp dport 25 j DROP
